XenotypeDef.label: Grisol
XenotypeDef.description: Sharing many similarities with Wasters, Grisol were genetically engineered to endure highly polluted areas. Grisol colonies have a singular goal: to spread their toxic environment to other planets. They are extremely proficient in ranged and melee combat, but lack the skills to maintain a civilized society.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Tox raiders with high combat ability and low skills to maintain society
